name: SaiHR Tech
description: SaiHR Tech has been sourcing and supplying the Human resource Requirements for our own O&M project sites, all over India for the past ten years thus delivering end to end Manpower Services, not only for our own O&M projects, but also to various associates or partnered companies.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Reliable & Cost Efficient Recruitment Agency Based On Los Angeles
ShortDescription: SaiHR Tech has been sourcing and supplying the Human resource Requirements for our own O&M project sites, all over India for the past ten years thus delivering end to end Manpower Services, not only for our own O&M projects, but also to various associates or partnered companies.
enhanced_description: SaiHR Tech is an HR technology service provider with over ten years of experience, specializing in end-to-end manpower services. They cater to human resource requirements for their own Operations & Maintenance (O&M) project sites across India, as well as for various associated or partnered companies. Their services focus on sourcing and supplying talent, aiming to help clients hire top talent faster and more efficiently.
key_use_cases: Application Screening and Scheduling for Recruitment
competitive_advantages: Over 10 years of experience in manpower services
